about_page_author_dung_kai_cheung_desc: DUNG Kai Cheung shares his insights on publishing NFT books on blockchain: fair revenue sharing and reconnecting authors with readers.
about_page_author_kin_ko_desc: Kin Ko explains how blockchain technology addresses issues in second-hand book trading, royalty distribution, and book ownership.
about_page_author_fu_yue_an_desc: Discovering the surprising world of digital books with signed autographs â€” Fu Yue'an shares his experience publishing ebooks on 3ook.com.
about_page_author_stories_content: Hear from renowned authors about their experience publishing on 3ook.com and embracing the future of digital books.
about_page_contact_content: Join our community of over 10,000 subscribers and experience the future of reading and listening.
about_page_feature_affiliate_desc: Earn up to 30% of the book price by promoting quality content. Share books you love and get rewarded for every sale through your referral.
about_page_feature_ai_narration_desc: Every book comes with AI-generated narration in the author's voice, creating an immersive listening experience. (Except for books with license restrictions)
about_page_feature_author_benefits_desc: Authors receive 60-90% of revenue share and can easily migrate from other platforms.
about_page_feature_curate_to_earn_desc: Support your favorite books by staking LIKE tokens, boost their visibility on the storefront, and earn rewards. The more stake a book receives, the higher it appears in the store.
about_page_feature_dual_format_desc: Switch seamlessly between reading and listening modes for the perfect experience anytime, anywhere.
about_page_feature_web3_desc: Built on blockchain technology with simple login options - use email or connect your Web3 wallet.
about_page_hero_subtitle: 3ook.com is an AI-powered book platform that transforms how you experience books - books can be both read and heard, narrated by AI in different voice actor or author's voice.
about_page_mission_content: We aim to become your AI book attendant (AI æ›¸åƒ®), bridging technology and storytelling to reshape how cultural content is transmitted and experienced.
about_page_platform_evolution: 3ook.com represents a major upgrade from Liker Land bookstore - enhanced AI capabilities, simplified user experience, expanded mobile support, and powered by {likecoin_v3} for curate-to-earn staking.
about_page_team_content: 3ook.com is developed by Liker Land team. We're a team passionate about merging new and old industries through innovative technology.
about_page_what_is_content: 3ook.com is an evolution of Liker Land bookstore, launching with revolutionary AI-powered reading features. Built on web3 technology with a decentralized bookstore, we're re-imagining how readers connect with stories and authors.
account_export_private_key_not_supported: Export private key is not supported.

app_description: 3ook.com is an AI reading companion with a decentralized bookstore powered by LikeCoin v3, built by Liker Land. Every book is readable and audible with AI narration. Support your favorite books through staking and earn rewards.
